revenue_performance.summary: Dabur grew ahead of the category and gained volume market shares despite a slowdown.
key_points: Gained volume market shares of 240 bps

profitability.summary: Consolidated gross margins expanded, but operating profit declined due to deleverage from revenue decline.
key_points: Consolidated gross margins expanded by 102 basis points
Operating profit declined by 16.4% due to deleverage from revenue decline

business_outlook.summary: No explicit business outlook or guidance provided.

key_challenges.summary: No explicit challenges or headwinds mentioned, but a slowdown is referenced.

strategic_initiatives.summary: Dabur has a multipronged strategy to drive growth, including ramping up the drinks portfolio and improving affordability.
key_points: Improving affordability through pack price architecture

market_conditions.summary: The market is experiencing a slowdown, but Dabur is growing ahead of the category.
key_points: Dabur is growing ahead of the category
